Articles.Content:
Hi !

I got a Workable version of the Mirage G8-01 . Plane stay under control but wings still tilt a bit ! Don't have better result after trying 3 variable wing method . I finally finish with a double washer (free+motor couple) and 2 strut connector to the plane core .

Unfortunately , This fly horible without SAS !! I put a DL link for PPL who want to test it or eventually improve it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

It handle 31.8G max at see level but decrease fast in altitude ( wings may broke under 20G at 3000M ) No danger in second position .

EDIT : Decrease wing angle for not exceed 20G !

You can see how it work :

![Mirage%20G8-01%20%28Workable%29.gif?psid=1](https://jhy6xw-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2p_DzS4p9p0HttyHhhLNBBJHKiDS3j_A992DPIVjjPYx6onwMUiWfU2Ap3PKj7ECdMKMoZwWqVAoRf_kQoim6maePY__N4yi8ZJjseM50xpaCeTEsQxDFA1p7LO2PNvb4JYzXQHCuKfJO88O7gGvv94kQR9ToDLvIW5T1VtLIDJsE/Mirage%20G8-01%20%28Workable%29.gif?psid=1)

2nd Prototype :[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1443&authkey=!AOWmFfe4NJ3vBDw&ithint=file%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1443&authkey=!AOWmFfe4NJ3vBDw&ithint=file%2Ccraft)

If u are any suggestion to improve IR moving wing , your welcome !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T13:57:23Z" title="05/25/2015 01:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**

You know, the name reminds me of another certain G8 i really like...

![2009_Pontiac_G8_GT--DC.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/0a/2009_Pontiac_G8_GT--DC.jpg)

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Haha ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) ! That could be my next project !

I got one car too build with MSI-IR -> Look at my signature

HI !

I edit the first post with better aircraft , moving wing & add the DL link.

I still work on it , but you can actually fly with it .
